bom jogo, tem killers legais survivors legais e as 2 funções são legais de jogar assassino ou sobrevivente, tem mecanicas bem legais perks, items , complementos , mas esse jogo tem algumas coisas n muito boas que são alguns bugs que atrapalham a gameplay do jogo realmente e a desenvolvedora taca o foda-se, hitbox as vezes é bugado e também  o jogo teria muito para ser um jogo realmente competitivo mas a desenvolvedora também n reforça a competitividade no jogo e na comunidade, mas tirando esses pontos vale muito apena comprar e jogar... recomendo.

+Интересный геймплей

+Атмосфера
+Приятный саунд дизайн

В целом, добротный продукт для игры в соло, или с друзьями.
Та же помойка что и полтора года назад. В чем-то лучше в чем-то хуже.

I HATE THIS GAME. Probably the only reason that I keep playing is that I also hate myself.

The matchmaking is absurdly broken, the playerbase is toxic and the game is riddled with bugs. Every new patch brings additional content, along with dozens of bugs, with at least a few game breaking ones. I don't think there was a single moment since I started playing, when something major wasn't broken.

I genuinely don't recommend picking up this game. It does have some fun moments and you can get hooked on it pretty hard (I know I did) but it's just not worth the massive amount of frustration that comes with playing Dead by Daylight.

tl;dr Game is addictive but matchmaking is horrendous, community is garbage, everything is bugged and the devs are slow with making any of that better. Don't get this game if you value your mental health.
Доведёт любой пробел до Инсульта (Настоятельно рекомендую)

This game is only fun with friends and even then is a frustrating experience.  Lack of response from certain actions, hitboxes, tryhard strategies that destroy the experience if you're unlucky, etc.  Outside of playing with friends, I have no desire to play this game.

This game is awesome, I really enjoy it. It's exhilarating and suspenseful and just the right amount of scary. Every match is different because there are lots of killers and survivors, and the perks each survivor and killer has can make the gameplay different in many ways. There are a ton of maps and they have so many complex layouts. I just wish the queue time to play a killer was shorter, it takes a long time to find a match as the killer, especially during double bloodpoints events.

gra jest swietna i klimat gry rowniez ale osoby ktore graja w ta gre juz nie, ludzie nie potrawia normalnie grac i pomagac innym jak np sciaganie z haka innych ososb tylko wola sb spierdolic z mapy a 2 osoby jeszcze zywe na tej mapie niech sb zgina polecam te gre osoba ktore umieja grac zespołowo bo jak ktos nie umie to wszyscy tylko sie bd wkurwiac i nie bd mozna nic zrobic i tylko sie marnuje czas na odratowanie takich osob a gdy dojdzie do sytułacji w ktorej ta osoba ktora nie umie grac zespołowo bedzie musiała pomoc 2 osobie to w tedy bd miala najprawdopodobniej wyjebane na ta osobe i sb podzie dalej i da sie zabic przez killera, apropo killerow to tez trzeba umiec grac killerem bo to nie jest fajna zabawa gdy killer złapie tylko cb i bd sie nad doba znecał albo powiesi cie na haku i elo benc giniesz bo przy tb campi na inne osoby ktore i tak cb nie uratuja bo wiedza ze zgina wiec mowie gra sama w sb i wgl pomysł do gry super ale ludzie ktorzy graja w ta gre wgl nie umieja grac niech sb pojda pasjansa układac a nie kurwa w takie gry graja pierdole takich kurwa pedałkow ktorzy cb nie widza ale magicznym cudem cb trafia i giniesz kurwa a zaden gracz ci nie pomoze bo sa cipkami

第五人格4阶屠夫玩家过来玩原版了，玩逃生者刚刚到15，感觉比第五难啊，血腥程度比第五好，我不知道怎么和队友交流，游戏感觉还需要多点队友交流，这样逃生者还可以打打，现在排个屠夫太久了，逃生者是秒排，喜欢玩屠夫的人感觉很难受，每天打几盘逃生者，有时候一个队友挂机或者很菜就没的打了，游戏还是平衡点好玩。

Jogo bom porém,ruim.
A demora pra achar partidas é grande e o desbalanceamento é maior ainda,se vc for um baby killer e cair com um timezinho pronto,já pode se preparar para sofrer e na maioria das vezes vai ver que os jogadores são todos rank 4-8 enquanto vc é 16-17.
Veredito Final:o jogo é bom mas precisa ser mais trabalhado em algumas questões de balanceamento 
ps.Esqueci de falar da hitbox ridícula que provavelmente nunca vão consertar.

Well, I've been playing this game on the Xbox One for over a year, and I recently purchased it again on my PC simple to pressure more of my friends into playing it. The game has a grand atmosphere that really draws players in and gameplay that, while sometimes infuriating and annoying, if innovative and fun. The game also has rich lore if you care to dig deeper into the meaning of it all. Anyways, if I'm willing to buy it twice, then I can certainly say it's worth buying once!

Von der grundsätzlichen Idee sehr cool, aber nachdem die Entwickler nach Jahren nicht in der Lage sind campende Killer zu verhindern - leider klar keine Empfehlung.
Und für alle die jetzt kommen mit "besser spielen" - auch die besten Spieler hängen mal am Haken - und wenn dann der Killer stumpf davor stehen bleibt, dann kann man einfach nichts machen. Und wenn dann die Random-Survs am Haken auch noch das Sterben aktiv beschleunigen (Fluchtversuche, bei Stufe 2 nicht dagegen ankämpfen) - und nicht versuchen für das restliche Team Zeit rauszuholen - dann suckt das Spiel mal wieder extrem

對人類而言，對別人略施小惠，無非是希望將來能收到「回報」。
對一個人好，就是希望那個人也對自己好， 世界上沒有不求回報的付出。
即使真有人「不求回報」……那也是希望自己將來死後「靈魂能上天堂」。
